title: What is the meaning of the song 'Lean on Me'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are the lyrics. Try reading them. I can't imagine how anyone here could make the meaning more clear than the lyrics already do. I take this from a religious point of view, as a sort of indirect message from God telling us that even when we feel life is too hard to handle or that we just are too tired, that He will be there to help bring us up. It could also mean a stronger person who means a lot to you and or vice-versa, who is offering you support and care in all that you do. It is a form of assurance that he has your back.
